args: Does this describe a specific, new, official action or formal announcement already taken/made by the Trump administration? Answer only "yes" or "no". Trump says he ordered Treasury Department to stop producing new pennies President Donald Trump says he has ordered the U.S. Treasury to stop minting new pennies, calling their production “wasteful.” “For far too long the United States has minted pennies which literally cost us more than 2 cents,” Trump said in a Truth Social post Sunday night. “Let’s rip the waste out of our great nations budget, even if it’s a penny at a time.” Read the full story
